thread.title: Paul ODonnell
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Paul ODonnell

author: Paul ODonnell
title: Paul ODonnell
text: I have used Shower doctor three times now and each time they have been excellent. I sought advice on repairing a shower and they steered me to the right part, and also a replacement shower, which seemed to overheat and called them up and received an immediate replacement the next day. DONT go anywhere else.
